cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 13th Jan 2026 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 13th Jan 2026 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Standard 4 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Girls are in a larger room with its own vanity and sink, a hair dryer and flat iron. Inclusive in the rate is 1 pillow per guest, bed bug protectors, dry-cleaned sheet, personal reading light, power plugs, locker and shelf.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Inclusive in the room rate are 2 feather pillows p/ guest, bed bug protectors, crisp dry-cleaned sheets, duvets and coverlets in a freshly made bed. Large sliding doors make this a very airy room. You'll also find an alarm-clock for your convenience.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
